passives.name: Sneak Slash Extension
passives.desc:
Sneak Slash use +2

When using Sneak Slash:
 â€¢  PG attack hit count becomes 3; tremendously increased cumulative BRV damage
 â€¢ Stolen BRV may exceed MAX BRV up to 120%
 â€¢ Brigand's Glove duration +1
 â€¢ Triggers additional  PF attack after use

After using Sneak Slash:
 â€¢ Sneak Slash becomes Sneak Slash+ (moves own next turn to just before target's next turn on hit [except during summoning]; cancels previously granted Genji Gloveã€? Miracle Shoes; self: 6 turns Genji Glove or Miracle Shoes; returns to Sneak Slash after use)

When using Mug:
 â€¢  PG attack hit count becomes 2; moderately increased cumulative BRV damage
 â€¢ Genji Gloveã€? Miracle Shoes duration +1

When using HP Attack+ (Genji Glove):
 â€¢ Large BRV damage boost
 â€¢ Stolen BRV may exceed MAX BRV up to 120%

When using HP Attack+ (Miracle Shoes):
 â€¢ Large BRV damage boost
 â€¢ Does not add to turn count; does consume turn during summoningã€? support
passives.short_desc: Sneak Slash Extension: Boost to Sneak Slash

passives.name: Buffed Attack Boost Up
passives.desc: Moderately raises MAX BRVã€? ATK with active buffs
passives.short_desc: Buffed Attack Boost Up: Raises MAX BRVã€? ATK

passives.name: Phoenix Ray Extension
passives.desc:
Phoenix Ray use +1

When using Phoenix Ray:
 â€¢  PG attack hit count becomes 3; tremendously increased cumulative BRV damage
 â€¢ Moderately increased BRV damage when attacking single target
 â€¢ Stolen BRV may exceed MAX BRV up to 150%
passives.short_desc: Phoenix Ray Extension: Boost to Phoenix Ray

passives.desc: Slightly raises INT BRVã€? ATK
